basics.name: Justin Honda
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with an emphasis in bioinformatics in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021 and subsequent matriculation into the M.S program

volunteer.summary: Pre-Medical Intern at M.D private practice
highlights: Measured eye parameters for various patients
Observed multiple surgeries ranging from basic cataract surgeries to corneal transplants at the Hawaii Eye Surgery Center
Reviewed case and clinical studies focusing on uveitis under the direction of a board-certified opthalmologist

volunteer.summary: Taught at an east-Oahu private school while a full time student. Had a preliminary role in the formation of a subsequent non-profit organization.
highlights: Taught algebra 1 curriculum to elementary level students
Raised the awareness of skin cancer and the importance of SPF
Advised and advocated an elementary school project that used CAD to 3-D print model shade structures
Used iOS specific hardware and software to measure the UV intensity in east-Oahu

awards.title: Magna Cum Laude with honors
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to graduating seniors who have attained above a 3.80 GPA.

summary.title: Speaker
summary.summary: Presented a case study on post-operative necrotizing scleritis. See 'projects' for more information.
